title: New Cisco tools aim to enable green networks, data centers - TechTarget
summary: Cisco has been working on sustainability for two decades and has prioritized it as a business initiative, which it believes can increase profits and employee retention. Cisco's energy-efficient data center networking products can help organizations improve data center efficiency while modernizing their data center networks. Cisco's UCS X-Series servers use Intersight software to provide real-time data to help IT pros understand their data center energy consumption.
green_innovation: TRUE, Cisco's energy-efficient networking products contribute to the environmental sustainability goal of reducing resource consumption during operation.
business_innovation: TRUE, Cisco's UCS x-Series Servers are a new product that differs significantly and positively from their previous offerings.
green_product: TRUE, Cisco's UCS x-Series Servers are designed, manufactured, and used in a way that significantly reduces their environmental impact throughout their lifecycle by reducing energy consumption.
green_process: FALSE, not mentioned in the text.
product_or_process: Cisco's energy-efficient data center networking products
likely_naics_codes: ['334210 - Telephone Apparatus Manufacturing', '334220 - Radio and Television Broadcasting and Wireless Communications Equipment Manufacturing', '334419 - Other Electronic Component Manufacturing', '519190 - Other Information Services']
greenwashing: FALSE, there is no evidence that Cisco's UCS x-Series Servers are an example of greenwashing.
